subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Lakers are set up for a comeback, if only they could show signs of one against the Mavericks, who lead, 2-0, with Game 3 on Friday in Dallas.
snippet: The Lakers are set up for a comeback, if only they could show signs of one against the Mavericks, who lead, 2-0, with Game 3 on Friday in Dallas.
